PAD.synopsis: The player realises that a crossbow found in Ketheric City is not Dueargar make. If they pass a history check, they recognise it as Sharran.
PAD.how_to_trigger: Walk to -670.127; 13.408; 403.24 and succeed on the History check to recognise the make of the crossbow.

PAD_0.speaker: Player
PAD_0.text: I know this design - Shar's faithful wield crossbows like these.

PAD_1.speaker: Player
PAD_1.text: This crossbow is too well designed to be made by duergar.
